articles.content:
Jaiveer Shergill resigned from the Congress on Wednesday, hours after he said that he had put in his papers from the post of the party's national spokesperson.

articles.title: Nitish Kumar Wins Majority Test In Bihar Assembly, BJP Walks Out: 10 Facts
articles.description: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's new Grand Alliance government won the trust vote in the assembly today. The BJP walked out in protest during his address ahead of the voting.
articles.content: <li>In the voting that followed after the BJP walkout, Mr Kumar got all 160 votes. With 164 MLAs supporting Nitish Kumar's government in the 243-member Bihar assembly, the test of majority was mostly… [+2688 chars]
